name: Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego [SG]
description:
Where in the U.S.A. Is Carmen Sandiego? Deluxe Edition is an educational adventure game developed by Broderbund Software. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by Broderbund Software. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Where in the U.S.A. Is Carmen Sandiego? Deluxe Edition on PC.
